definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: This thesis mainly studies efficient physical layer algorithms for CMMB.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究CMMB物理层主要模块的算法。

sentences.english: The lavender tones will offer love to the space between in one's field and biology.
sentences.chinese: 淡紫音调将为物理层与场中的两极空间提供爱。

sentences.english: The physical layer consists of the actual disk.
sentences.chinese: 物理层由实际的磁盘组成。

sentences.english: Next we switch back to the physical level and take a closer look at accessors.
sentences.chinese: 下面我们回到物理层来仔细看看访问器。

sentences.english: The standard and technical guideline of physical layer (PHY) are emphasized.
sentences.chinese: 其中着重讲述了物理层标准和各项指标。

sentences.english: Conceptually, the logical volume layer sits between the application and physical layers.
sentences.chinese: 从概念上讲，逻辑卷层位于应用程序层和物理层之间。

sentences.english: Humans need not travel in the physical once they open unto their inner reality.
sentences.chinese: 一旦打开到内在实相，则人类不需要在物理层上旅行。

sentences.english: However, at the logical level, code is not aware of physical level types.
sentences.chinese: 然而在逻辑层，代码并不知道物理层类型。

pinyin: jie4 zhi4 fang3 wen4 kong4 zhi4
